original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang ji lta bu zhig yin par khong du chud par bya zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang ji lta bu zhig yin par khong du chud par bya zhe na /
translated: What kind of particular should be understood?

original: de'i phyir spyi don gang nye ba dang / mi nye ba dag las shes pa la snang ba tha dad pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi don gang nye ba dang / mi nye ba dag las shes pa la snang ba tha dad pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore he says: A particular is that which is the basis of a universal, and which is the cause of the appearance of a cognition that is different from that of what is not present.

original: nye ba ni yul rung ba na 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba ni yul rung ba na 'dug pa'o //
translated: Nearby is the object that is in a suitable place.

original: mi nye ba ni yul rung ba ma yin pa na 'dug pa dang / thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa'o //
analyzed: mi nye ba ni yul rung ba ma yin pa na 'dug pa dang / thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa'o //
translated: Far is the object that is in an unsuitable place or that does not exist at all.

original: nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa de ni nye ba dang mi nye ba'o//
analyzed: nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa de ni nye ba dang mi nye ba'o//
translated: The nearby and the far are the nearby and the far.

original: de gnyis kyis ni shes pa la rnam par gsal ba dang / mi gsal bar bye brag tu byed de nye na ni gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis ni shes pa la rnam par gsal ba dang / mi gsal bar bye brag tu byed de nye na ni gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: These two distinguish the cognition as clear and unclear, for when nearby, the cognition that appears is clear.

original: nye ba ma yin na ni gsal ba ma yin pa'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nye ba ma yin na ni gsal ba ma yin pa'i shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: When far, the cognition that appears is unclear.

original: don gang shes pa la snang ba bye brag tu byed pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: don gang shes pa la snang ba bye brag tu byed pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: That object which distinguishes the appearance in cognition is the particular intrinsic identity.

original: dngos po don dam par yod pa mngon sum gyi yul ma yi nam ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid yul zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po don dam par yod pa mngon sum gyi yul ma yi nam ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid yul zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Since an ultimately existent entity is not the object of direct perception, how can it be said to be the object of the particular intrinsic identity?

original: de'i phyir de nyid don dam par yod pa sta zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid don dam par yod pa sta zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚ÄúThat is the ultimate existence.‚Äù

original: de ni don yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas don dam pa'o //
analyzed: de ni don yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas don dam pa'o //
translated: Since it is an object and it is ultimate, it is the ultimate object.

original: dam pa zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa ste btags pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa ste btags pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúultimate‚Äù means ‚Äúnot fabricated,‚Äù that is, ‚Äúnot imputed.‚Äù

original: don dam par yod pa ni don dam par yod pa ste /
analyzed: don dam par yod pa ni don dam par yod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúExists ultimately‚Äù means ‚Äúexists ultimately.‚Äù

original: rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExists by intrinsic identity ultimately‚Äù is what is meant.

original: de bas ji skad brjod ba'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas ji skad brjod ba'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the error stated does not arise.

original: ci'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa yin no zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa yin no zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it that ‚Äúexists by intrinsic identity ultimately‚Äù?

original: de'i phyir dngos po ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: To answer that, he says, ‚Äúbecause a thing is only the characteristic of what is able to perform a function.‚Äù

original: don zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni dgos pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPurpose‚Äù is what is needed.

original: byed pa ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPerformance‚Äù is activity.

original: don byed pa ni don byed pa ste /
analyzed: don byed pa ni don byed pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúPerformance of a purpose‚Äù is performance of a purpose.

original: dgos pa byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dgos pa byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means ‚Äúperformance of what is needed.‚Äù

original: der nus pa ni don byed nus pa ste /
analyzed: der nus pa ni don byed nus pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAble to perform a purpose‚Äù is able to perform a purpose.

original: dngos po gang don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa de ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po gang don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa de ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: That which is a thing, the nature of which is the characteristic of what is able to perform a purpose, is the characteristic of what is able to perform a purpose.

original: de'i ngo bo ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid kho na'o //
translated: Its nature is only the characteristic of that which is able to perform a function.

original: de lta bas na don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it has the characteristic of that which is able to perform a function,

original: 'di skad du gang don byed nus pa de ni dngos po zhes bya la /
analyzed: 'di skad du gang don byed nus pa de ni dngos po zhes bya la /
translated: it is taught that ‚Äúthat which is able to perform a function is called an entity.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang don byed do zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang don byed do zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: And a specific characteristic also performs a function.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, a specific characteristic exists ultimately.

original: gzhan ni spyi'i mtshan @8a * //
analyzed: gzhan ni spyi'i mtshan @8a * //
translated: The other is a universal characteristic.

original: nyid de zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin bshad pa las gzhan pa'i gzhal bya gang yin pa don spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: nyid de zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin bshad pa las gzhan pa'i gzhal bya gang yin pa don spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: That which is a cognized object other than the explanation of the nature of a specific characteristic is a universal characteristic,

original: don gang nye bar yang rung mi nye bar yang rung mi nye bar yang rung shes pa rnam pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: don gang nye bar yang rung mi nye bar yang rung mi nye bar yang rung shes pa rnam pa gcig kho nar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: because a cognition is of only one aspect, whether an object is present or not present.

original: de ni rjes su dpog pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa'i yul kho na'o //
analyzed: de ni rjes su dpog pa'i yul yin no zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su dpag pa'i yul kho na'o //
translated: It is the object of inference. A universal characteristic is only the object of inference.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is pervaded by the possession of going.

original: 'di ni skabs ma yin yang tshig mang por 'gyur du dogs pas ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'di ni skabs ma yin yang tshig mang por 'gyur du dogs pas ma bshad do //
translated: Although this is not the proper place, I do not explain it here for fear of prolixity.

original: 'di ltar 'dir ni rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i skabs su bab pas mtshan nyid de las bzlog na rtog par sla bas spyi'i mtshan nyid smos te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir ni rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i skabs su bab pas mtshan nyid de las bzlog na rtog par sla bas spyi'i mtshan nyid smos te /
translated: Here, since the occasion is the statement of the specific characteristics, I state the general characteristic, since it is easy to understand the reverse of that characteristic.

original: 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin no zhes tshig nyung dur bya ba'i phyir bkod do //
analyzed: 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin no zhes tshig nyung dur bya ba'i phyir bkod do //
translated: I set it forth in order to state it in few words: ‚ÄúThis is the object of inference.‚Äù

original: gzhan du na ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ston par tshig 'di dag thams cad yang bzlas dgos pa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ston par tshig 'di dag thams cad yang bzlas dgos pa 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be necessary to repeat all these words in order to show the object of inference.

original: 'bras bu la log par rtog pa gsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu la log par rtog pa gsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify the misconception of the result, he says:

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe result of valid cognition is just the cognition of perception.‚Äù

original: de'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'brel pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The connection is this:

original: gal te mngon sum tshad mar 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum tshad mar 'dod na /
translated: If you accept perception as valid cognition,

original: de'i tshe gzhal bya gzugs la sogs pa la yongs su dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhal bya gzugs la sogs pa la yongs su dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, the result of valid knowledge would be the character of thorough analysis of the object of comprehension, such as form.

original: dper na sta res shing la sogs pa gcad par bya ba la dum bu gnyis su 'gyur ba 'bras bu mthong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sta res shing la sogs pa gcad par bya ba la dum bu gnyis su 'gyur ba 'bras bu mthong ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it would be like seeing the result of the axe, which is the two pieces of wood that are to be cut.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu ste zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúThat very consciousness of direct perception is the result of valid knowledge.‚Äù

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin gyi mngon sum las gud na 'bras bu med do //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa de nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin gyi mngon sum las gud na 'bras bu med do //
translated: That very consciousness of direct perception is the result of valid knowledge; the result is not separate from direct perception.üîΩThe nature of the result of direct perception is that very consciousness of direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba de ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba de ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i phyir don rtog pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir don rtog pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúBecause it has the nature of the realization of the object.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa ni gtan la phebs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni gtan la phebs pa'o //
translated: Realization is ascertainment.

original: dngos bzhin de dang ldan pa'i mngon sum gang yin pa de ni don rtogs pa'i phyir ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dngos bzhin de dang ldan pa'i mngon sum gang yin pa de ni don rtogs pa'i phyir ngo bo'o //
translated: That direct perception which has the nature of that is the nature of the realization of the object.

original: de'i dngos po ni don rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na ste de'i phyir don rtogs ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni don rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na ste de'i phyir don rtogs ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its entity is the very nature of the realization of the object, therefore, because it is the nature of the realization of the object.

original: de ni 'di skad du tshad ma dang gzhal byar tha snyad btags pa la don gtan la 'bebs pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad du tshad ma dang gzhal byar tha snyad btags pa la don gtan la 'bebs pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu yin par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said: The definition of the ascertainment of the object in the convention of valid knowledge and object of comprehension is the effect.

original: shes pa ni don gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: shes pa ni don gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: Because consciousness is the nature of the ascertainment of the object.

original: mngon sum yang shes pa'i rang bzhin yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: mngon sum yang shes pa'i rang bzhin yin par 'dod do //
translated: And direct perception is asserted to be the nature of consciousness.

original: de lta bas na mngon sum ni don gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin yin @8b ba'i phyir mngon sum nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na mngon sum ni don gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin yin @8b ba'i phyir mngon sum nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because direct perception is the nature of the ascertainment of the object, it should be understood that direct perception itself is the nature of the effect.

original: gal te mngon sum nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin na 'o na tshad ma gang zhig yin par rig par bya snyam pa la /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin na 'o na tshad ma gang zhig yin par rig par bya snyam pa la /
translated: If direct perception itself is the nature of the effect, then what should be understood as the valid knowledge?

original: de'i phyir don dang 'dra ba 'di'i tshad ma ste zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir don dang 'dra ba 'di'i tshad ma ste zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThis valid knowledge is like the object.‚Äù

original: 'dra ba ni mthun ba la bya'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba ni mthun ba la bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLike‚Äù means similar.

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi ste don gyi rnam pa can gyi mngon sum gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi ste don gyi rnam pa can gyi mngon sum gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚Äú Of that‚Äù refers to direct perception. The meaning is that direct perception, which has the aspect of the object, is itself a valid cognition.

original: don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin par ci mngon snyam pa la /
analyzed: don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin par ci mngon snyam pa la /
translated: How do you know that what is like the object is a valid cognition?

original: de'i phyir de'i dbang gis don rtogs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i dbang gis don rtogs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äúbecause ascertainment of the object is established by the power of that.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir don dam 'dra ba'i dbang gis gtan la 'bebs pa de'i phyir 'dra ba de nyid tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don dam 'dra ba'i dbang gis gtan la 'bebs pa de'i phyir 'dra ba de nyid tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Because ascertainment is established by the power of what is like the object, therefore that likeness is itself a valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni sngon por rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni sngon por rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: For, it is ascertained that this is the cognition of blue,

original: ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa de'i rgyu gang yin pa de tshad ma yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa de'i rgyu gang yin pa de tshad ma yin par 'dod do //
translated: but not the cognition of yellow. The cause of that ascertainment is asserted to be a valid cognition.

original: dbang po ni rnam par gzhag pa 'di byed pa mi nus te /
analyzed: dbang po ni rnam par gzhag pa 'di byed pa mi nus te /
translated: The sense faculty is not able to make that ascertainment.

original: 'di ltar dbang po de ni shes pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rgyu yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po de ni shes pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rgyu yin pas /
translated: For, that sense faculty is the common cause of all consciousnesses.

original: de'i phyir so sor nges pa'i sa rnam par gzhag pa byed pa nus pa yin na ji ltar 'gyur gal te dbang po de sngon por shes pa kho nar skyed par byed la /
analyzed: de'i phyir so sor nges pa'i sa rnam par gzhag pa byed pa nus pa yin na ji ltar 'gyur gal te dbang po de sngon por shes pa kho nar skyed par byed la /
translated: If the eye produces only the consciousness of blue,

original: ser po la sogs par shes pa ni ma skyes pa ni /
analyzed: ser po la sogs par shes pa ni ma skyes pa ni /
translated: and the consciousness of yellow, etc. is not produced,

original: de'i tshe rnam par gzhag pa byed pa nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par gzhag pa byed pa nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be able to establish a particular object.

original: nye ba yang thun mong yin pa'i phyir dbang po bzhin te /
analyzed: nye ba yang thun mong yin pa'i phyir dbang po bzhin te /
translated: Proximity is also common to all, like the sense faculty,

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: and is not the cause of establishment.

original: 'bras bu ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir so sor nges pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir so sor nges pa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: The result is not common, and therefore it becomes the cause of establishment of a particular object.

original: 'di ltar sngon po'i rnam par shes pa la sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ser po la sogs par shes pa la med par rnam par gzhag pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po'i rnam par shes pa la sngon po'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ser po la sogs par shes pa la med par rnam par gzhag pa byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the consciousness of blue is established as the consciousness of blue, and that which is the consciousness of yellow, etc. is not.

original: gang gi tshe sngon po'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngon po'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: When it is the form of blue,

original: 'di ni sngon por rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni sngon por rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: this is the cognition of blue,üîΩand it is not the cognition of yellow, etc.

original: ser po ni ma yin no snyam pa de'i phyir don dang 'dra ba nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: ser po ni ma yin no snyam pa de'i phyir don dang 'dra ba nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: It is not yellow. Therefore, a valid cognition is that which is in accordance with its object.

original: rigs pa'i thig pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa las le'u dang po'o /
analyzed: rigs pa'i thig pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob ma la phan pa las le'u dang po'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter of the disciple‚Äôs benefit, the commentary on the Yukti·π£a·π£·π≠ikƒÅ.

original: // / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bye brag gis yang dag pa'i shes pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa de la mngon sum ni spros pa dang bcas te bshad zin to //
analyzed: // / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i bye brag gis yang dag pa'i shes pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa de la mngon sum ni spros pa dang bcas te bshad zin to //
translated: The two types of valid cognition, direct perception and inference, have already been explained in detail with elaboration.

original: rjes su dpag pa bshad par bzhed nas /üîΩrjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa bshad par bzhed nas / rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Now, wishing to explain inference, [the text] states:üîΩ‚ÄúInference is of two types.‚ÄùüîΩInference should be understood as being of two types.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par bya'o //üîΩshes @9a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par bya'o // shes @9a * //
translated: Since inference is of two types, it is not possible to explain it without distinguishing the two.

original: pa dang brjod pa'i ngo bo kho nas rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa gnyis shin tu ha dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni cung zad kyang med na /
analyzed: pa dang brjod pa'i ngo bo kho nas rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa gnyis shin tu ha dad pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni cung zad kyang med na /
translated: Since the two types of inference are completely different in terms of their nature as cognition and expression, and in terms of their own and others‚Äô purposes, there is not the slightest similarity between them.

original: gang gis ni sngar mtshan nyid brjod par bya /
analyzed: gang gis ni sngar mtshan nyid brjod par bya /
translated: By what means was the definition stated previously?

original: rab tu dbye ba byas na so sor nges pa'i mtshan nyid bde blag tu brjod par nus pas de'i phyir sngar rab tu dbye ba bstan to //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba byas na so sor nges pa'i mtshan nyid bde blag tu brjod par nus pas de'i phyir sngar rab tu dbye ba bstan to //
translated: When it is divided, it is possible to easily express its individual characteristics. Therefore, it was previously divided.

original: rang gi don dang / gzhan gyi don to zhes bya ba ni bye brag gis rnam par gnyis kho nar ston par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi don dang / gzhan gyi don to zhes bya ba ni bye brag gis rnam par gnyis kho nar ston par byed do //
translated: The statement one's own aim and the aim of another shows that it is divided into just two types by way of its distinction.

original: 'di'o don ces ba ni dgos ba bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'o don ces ba ni dgos ba bya ba ste /
translated: The statement this is the aim means the purpose of the activity.

original: rang gi dgos pa dang / gzhan gyi don dgos pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang gi dgos pa dang / gzhan gyi don dgos pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is a synonym for one's own purpose and the purpose of the aim of another.

original: gang gis bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni rang gi don yin la gang gis gzhan la go bar byed pa de ni gzhan gyi don yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni rang gi don yin la gang gis gzhan la go bar byed pa de ni gzhan gyi don yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that that by which one understands for oneself is one's own aim, and that by which one causes another to understand is the aim of another.

original: de la rang gi don ni rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las shes pa gang yin pa ste zhes bya ba ni 'di tshul gsum pa can yin pas na 'di ni tshul gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de la rang gi don ni rjes su dpag par bya ba la tshul gsum pa'i rtags las shes pa gang yin pa ste zhes bya ba ni 'di tshul gsum pa can yin pas na 'di ni tshul gsum pa'o //
translated: With regard to that, one's own aim is that which is knowledge from a reason having the three modes with regard to the object of inference. The statement because this has the three modes, it is the three modes means that this is the three modes.

original: 'dis don mtshon par byed pas na rtags so //
analyzed: 'dis don mtshon par byed pas na rtags so //
translated: It is a reason because it causes the understanding of an object.

original: de ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pas rjes su dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pas rjes su dpag par bya'o //
translated: It is to be inferred because it is to be understood through inference.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la mtshan nyid gsum pa'i rgyu las shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi don rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la mtshan nyid gsum pa'i rgyu las shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi don rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That which is the arising of the understanding from the reason that has the three modes with regard to the object to be inferred is called the inference for oneself.

original: rtag pa ltar snang ba las shes pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de rjes su dpag pa nyid yin pa bsal ba'i phyir tshul gsum pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rtag pa ltar snang ba las shes pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de rjes su dpag pa nyid yin pa bsal ba'i phyir tshul gsum pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúhaving the three modes‚Äù is stated in order to eliminate the arising of the understanding from a reason that appears to be permanent as being inference.

original: rtags shes pa dngos po rjes su dpag pa gnyis yin pa bsal ba'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba smos so// shes pa smos pa ni rtags rjes su dpa pa dngos su 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags shes pa dngos po rjes su dpag pa gnyis yin pa bsal ba'i phyir rjes su dpag par bya ba smos so// shes pa smos pa ni rtags rjes su dpa pa dngos su 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúto be inferred‚Äù is stated in order to eliminate the actual reason and the understanding from being inference. The phrase ‚Äúunderstanding‚Äù is stated in order to eliminate the actual reason from being inference.

original: gal te rjes su dpag bar bya ba'i yul shes pa tshad ma yin par 'dod na 'o na 'bras bu gang zhig yin snyam pa la de'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag bar bya ba'i yul shes pa tshad ma yin par 'dod na 'o na 'bras bu gang zhig yin snyam pa la de'i phyir /
translated: If the understanding of the object to be inferred is asserted to be a valid knowledge, then what is its result?

original: 'dir yang tshad ma'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ni mngon sum dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dir yang tshad ma'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ni mngon sum dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Here, the result of valid knowledge is like that of perception.

original: 'di ltar mngon sum la shes pa de nyid mtshan ma'i 'bras bur bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin te /üîΩdon gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩji ltar mngon sum gyi don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i don dang 'dra ba nyid tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon sum la shes pa de nyid mtshan ma'i 'bras bur bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin te / don gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar mngon sum gyi don dang 'dra ba tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa'i don dang 'dra ba nyid tshad ma yin te /
translated: Just as in the case of perception, the result of the sign is explained to be that very consciousness, in the same way, here, the result of valid knowledge is the consciousness that is inference, because it has the nature of determining the object.

original: de'i dbang gis don gtan la 'bebs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis don gtan la 'bebs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as the object that is like that of perception is valid knowledge, in the same way, the object that is like that of inference is valid knowledge, because it is established by the power of that.

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las zhes @9b bshad pa /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las zhes @9b bshad pa /
translated: The sign that has the three modes is the reason.

original: tshul gsum po de gang yin snyam pa la de'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul gsum po de gang yin snyam pa la de'i phyir /
translated: Since it is wondered what those three modes are, it is said:

original: tshul gsum pa nyid kyi rtags ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa nyid kyi rtags ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The sign that has the three modes is the reason.

original: tshul gsum pa'i dngos po ni tshul gsum pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i dngos po ni tshul gsum pa nyid do //
translated: The state of having the three modes is having the three modes.

original: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la yod pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan nyid la yod pa nyid ni tshul gcig yin te /üîΩde la yod pa zhes smos bas ni mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la yod pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan nyid la yod pa nyid ni tshul gcig yin te / de la yod pa zhes smos bas ni mig gis gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is to be inferred exists‚Äù is a reference to the property of the thesis that will be stated later in the text. The phrase ‚Äúthat which is to be inferred exists‚Äù is the first rule.

original: bstan pa smos pas ni /üîΩphyogs la gcig ma grub pa la sogs pa bsal te /üîΩmthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes bya ba ni rigs mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid tshul gnyis pa yin te /
